Summary (EN): Naveen Madev Naik requests to work from home due to a severe cold, stating he is unable to come to the office but will be completing his work remotely.
Summary (DE): 纳文·马德夫·奈克因严重感冒，请求在家工作，表示他无法到办公室，但将远程完成工作。

Summary (EN): Naveen Madev Naik is requesting leave due to an eye problem requiring immediate attention. He is experiencing discomfort and vision difficulty and is taking rest. He plans to work from home if his condition improves slightly.
Summary (DE): 纳文·马德夫·奈克因眼部问题需要立即治疗而申请休假。他正在经历不适和视力困难，正在休息。如果他的病情稍有好转，他计划在家工作。
